product_name: Thule Fat Tire Kit for T2 Bike Rack
long_description: An upgrade kit for carrying fat bikes on a Thule T2 Bike Carrier (sold separately), the Thule Fat Tire Kit for T2 Bike Rack allows you to go big with your portly-wheeled new ride. Oversize wheel holders accommodate fat tires up to 5 in., but works well with all size tires. Spring-loaded buckle and extra-long wheel strap supply quick and easy rear wheel fastening. Includes front wheel holder and rear wheel holder with integrated strap and buckle.
short_description: An upgrade kit for carrying fat bikes on a Thule T2 Bike Carrier (sold separately), the Thule Fat Tire Kit for T2 Bike Rack allows you to go big with your portly-wheeled new ride.
